short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension will automatically shorten URLs as you create your posted on BitClout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We have created the simplest way to shorten any links (urls) you include in your posts on BitClout.

All you have to do is install the extension and then it runs in the background when you are creating a new post on BitClout.

When it detects a link, it will shorten the link using BCLinky.com's services.

The extension doesn't shorten links until you either hit the spacebar after a link or hit the return key, then it does its magic.

NOTE: Depending on how BitClout is behaving, you might need to add another character or hit backspace/delete for the character counter to properly update after the link is shortened. 

Question? Feature Requests? https://bitclout.com/u/scottcents
